title: The Tyrant's Law
description: THE GREAT WAR CANNOT BE STOPPED. The tyrant Geder Palliako led his nation to war, but every victory called forth another conflict. Now the greater war spreads out before him and he is bent on bringing peace. No matter how many people he has to kill to do it. Cithrin bel Sarcour, rogue banker of the Medean Bank, has returned to the fold. Her apprenticeship has placed her in the path of war, but the greater dangers are the ones in her past and in her soul. Widowed and disgraced at the heart of the Empire, Clara Kalliam has become a loyal traitor, defending her nation against itself. And in the shadows of the world, Captain Marcus Wester tracks an ancient secret that will change the war in ways not even he can foresee. Return to the critically acclaimed epic series by master storyteller Daniel Abraham, the Dagger and the Coin. PRAISE FOR THE DAGGER AND THE COIN 'A seriously satisfying epic' SFX 'Truly stunning' SciFiNow 'A fascinating world and a great cast of beautifully drawn and deeply realised characters, all told in Abraham's trademark clean and vivid prose' George R. R. Martin
author: Daniel Abraham
